name: tablecover1
description_short: Small box suitable for mini pizzas
description_long: This small pizza box has 20-micron thickness and dimensions of 600 × 1000 mm. Ideal for various kitchen and packaging uses.

name: tablecover2
description_short: Medium box suitable for single-person pizzas
description_long: This medium pizza box has 25-micron thickness and dimensions of 800 × 1200 mm. Suitable for various kitchen and packaging uses.
